title: Nami taunt bugs
body: There is a bug in Nami's taunt ,"control 2", for her Koi skin and her Urf skin. She says her line "Afraid to get your feet wet?" or whatever else and then goes to splash the water forward with her tail, but theres no water. I'm pretty sure it works fine on her River Spirit skin but the other two, not at all and it's been bugged for a while. Please fix it Riot!

replies.body: I noticed this too, but I thought I was just wrong about it. xD

Hiya AngelFace15! 

Thanks for the report! We'll make sure Nami goes back to actually getting her feet (tail?) wet. :D
